definition: to sow/to scatter/to spread/to broadcast/Taiwan pr. [bo4]
sound/noise/note (of musical scale)/tone/news/syllable/reading (phonetic value of a character)

sentences.english: With the back end in place and ready to store messages, you need an announcer.
sentences.chinese: 后端就位并准备好存储消息后，您需要一个播音程序。

sentences.english: So, newscaster, what's the weather like today?
sentences.chinese: 那和，新闻播音员，今天天气怎么样？

sentences.english: Keep studying and you can become a newsreader.
sentences.chinese: 不断学习，你会成为一名新闻播音员的。
你是一位优秀的新闻播音员。

sentences.english: The weather girl batted.900 last week.
sentences.chinese: 上星期气象报告女播音员的正确率达90%。

sentences.english: Generally, the sound of an announcer is euphonic.
sentences.chinese: 一般来说，播音员的声音都很好听。

sentences.english: A radio announcer for the Steelers invented the "Terrible Towel" in nineteen seventy-five.
sentences.chinese: 为钢人队电台播音员发明七五年“可怕的毛巾”。

sentences.english: Two years later he retired and became a sports announcer for the NFL.
sentences.chinese: 两年后，他卸任，成了国家足球联盟的播音员。

sentences.english: Avoid weekend thinking and ignore the latest dire predictions of the newscasters.
sentences.chinese: 不要理会周末的焦虑和新闻播音员最近恐慌性的言论。

sentences.english: People told him that he sounded like a real radio announcer.
sentences.chinese: 有人对他说，他的嗓音就像一位真正的播音主持人。

sentences.english: Former versions were led by a militant-sounding male.
sentences.chinese: 以前的广播体操则是由军人般的男声播音。

sentences.english: Some foreign players and TV announcers have called for the horns to be banned.
sentences.chinese: 一些外国运动员和电视播音员呼吁的角被禁止。

sentences.english: Phoebe announces four programs a week.
sentences.chinese: 菲碧一星期担任四个节目的播音员。

sentences.english: Shangqiu normal school broadcasts much mark is qualified?
sentences.chinese: 商丘师范播音多少分合格？

definition: to read aloud with expression/to recite/to declaim
to direct a television or radio broadcast/director (TV, radio)
to write and direct (a play, film etc)/playwright-director/choreographer-director/scenarist-director
to broadcast a lecture, a book reading etc
(publishing) (abbr. for 美術編輯|美术编辑[mei3 shu4 bian1 ji2]) layout and graphics/graphic design/art editor/graphic designer
broadcast/CL:個|个[ge4]/broadcasting/to broadcast/(formal) to propagate/to publicize
